title: profile_info
description: Object for basic information on the profile.

analyte.description: Name of the analyte. Can be a compound, covariate or pharmacodynamic parameter. Must be defined in [compounds_and_analytes](compounds_and_analytes.md)

is_DDI.description: The profile is a DDI-profile (i.e., a perpetrator is administered).

is_DGI.description: The profile is a DGI-profile (i.e., the effect of a variant phenotype or genotype on the PK or PD of a compound is analyzed).

is_DFI.description: The profile is a DFI-profile (i.e., the effect of food administration is analyzed).

start_clocktime.description: Clocktime of the start of the study, i.e., time of the first drug administration. All time points (e.g., observations, administrations) should be relative to this time point. Given as hh:mm:ss.

profile_type.description: Type of the profile, i.e., 'PK' or 'PD'

organ.description: Organ or tissue, where observations were made.

aggregation_type.description: Type of aggregation, i.e. individual, typical or aggregated.
